s: ShelterLogic is a leader and innovator of outdoor shade, shelter, and lifestyle products. Shop now for all your shade, storage, and outdoor furniture needs.

ShelterLogic Corp. specializes in shelter manufacturing and distribution. The company was founded in January 2005. Its headquarters is based in Watertown, Connecticut, United States. ShelterLogic offers a broad range of portable shelters, portable garages, greenhouses, canopies, and pop-up canopies.
